omopColumns.name: nhs_number
omopColumns.query:
select 
	l1.NHSNumber, 
	l1.RecordConnectionIdentifier,
	l5.HospitalProviderSpellNumber,
	coalesce(max(l7.ActivityDateCriticalCare), MAX(l1.CDSActivityDate)) as observation_date, 
	l7.PersonWeight
from [omop_staging].[cds_line01] l1																			
	inner join [omop_staging].[cds_line07] l7													
		on l1.MessageId = l7.MessageId
	left outer join omop_staging.cds_line05 l5
		on l1.MessageId = l5.MessageId
where l7.PersonWeight is not null 
	and l1.NHSNumber is not null 				
group by 
	l1.NHSNumber, 
	l1.RecordConnectionIdentifier,
	l5.HospitalProviderSpellNumber,
	l7.ActivityDateCriticalCare, 
	l7.PersonWeight;

omopColumns.name: RecordConnectionIdentifier

dataSource.name: RecordConnectionIdentifier
dataSource.description: CDS specific identifier that binds multiple CDS messages together.

omopColumns.query:
select 
	l1.NHSNumber, 
	l1.RecordConnectionIdentifier,
	l5.HospitalProviderSpellNumber,
	coalesce(max(l7.ActivityDateCriticalCare), MAX(l1.CDSActivityDate)) as observation_date, 
	l7.PersonWeight
from [omop_staging].[cds_line01] l1																			
	inner join [omop_staging].[cds_line07] l7													
		on l1.MessageId = l7.MessageId
	left outer join omop_staging.cds_line05 l5
		on l1.MessageId = l5.MessageId
where l7.PersonWeight is not null 
	and l1.NHSNumber is not null 				
group by 
	l1.NHSNumber, 
	l1.RecordConnectionIdentifier,
	l5.HospitalProviderSpellNumber,
	l7.ActivityDateCriticalCare, 
	l7.PersonWeight;

omopColumns.name: observation_concept_id
omopColumns.operation_description: Constant value set to `42536495`. Current body weight

omopColumns.name: observation_type_concept_id
omopColumns.operation_description: Constant value set to `38000280`. Observation recorded from EHR

omopColumns.name: HospitalProviderSpellNumber

dataSource.name: HospitalProviderSpellNumber
dataSource.description: CDS specific hospital spell number that binds many episodes together.

omopColumns.query:
select 
	l1.NHSNumber, 
	l1.RecordConnectionIdentifier,
	l5.HospitalProviderSpellNumber,
	coalesce(max(l7.ActivityDateCriticalCare), MAX(l1.CDSActivityDate)) as observation_date, 
	l7.PersonWeight
from [omop_staging].[cds_line01] l1																			
	inner join [omop_staging].[cds_line07] l7													
		on l1.MessageId = l7.MessageId
	left outer join omop_staging.cds_line05 l5
		on l1.MessageId = l5.MessageId
where l7.PersonWeight is not null 
	and l1.NHSNumber is not null 				
group by 
	l1.NHSNumber, 
	l1.RecordConnectionIdentifier,
	l5.HospitalProviderSpellNumber,
	l7.ActivityDateCriticalCare, 
	l7.PersonWeight;

omopColumns.name: value_as_number

dataSource.name: PersonWeight
dataSource.description: PERSON WEIGHT is the result of the Clinical Investigation which measures the PATIENT's Weight, where the UNIT OF MEASUREMENT is 'Kilograms (kg)'.

omopColumns.query:
select 
	l1.NHSNumber, 
	l1.RecordConnectionIdentifier,
	l5.HospitalProviderSpellNumber,
	coalesce(max(l7.ActivityDateCriticalCare), MAX(l1.CDSActivityDate)) as observation_date, 
	l7.PersonWeight
from [omop_staging].[cds_line01] l1																			
	inner join [omop_staging].[cds_line07] l7													
		on l1.MessageId = l7.MessageId
	left outer join omop_staging.cds_line05 l5
		on l1.MessageId = l5.MessageId
where l7.PersonWeight is not null 
	and l1.NHSNumber is not null 				
group by 
	l1.NHSNumber, 
	l1.RecordConnectionIdentifier,
	l5.HospitalProviderSpellNumber,
	l7.ActivityDateCriticalCare, 
	l7.PersonWeight;
